name: Galacta Clash
description:
Can you save your planet from invasion of the Insectoids from Vermos galaxy with your Battle Clash Ship? Insectoids can only be destroyed by attacking them with a matching color so you must clash into them to allow your ship to synthesis their color then clash with them again to destroy them. Insectoids will continue to push towards invading planet Earth at a more aggressive pace as the battle continues until you send them back to Vermos.

Galacta Clash is an arcade action/puzzle game influenced by games like Zoop, Galaga, and Space Invaders. The game offers 

  • Single Player Arcade Mode
  • Single Player Puzzle Mode
  • 2 Player Co-Op Mode
  • 2 Player Versus Mode
  • 8-bit NES style pixel art
  • Chiptune music composed by Michel DeBois
